PreceptDef.label: improved
PreceptDef.description:
We can rely on our allies more frequently, and are better at parlaying with others.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Reduces the goodwill cost of refreshing e-branch permit cooldowns from 25 to 20.
 - Lowers the cooldown for requesting allied trade caravans by 40%.
 - Removes the cooldown for requesting allied military aid.
